name: Recharge (eddex)
description:
This is my entry for Wowie Jam 4.

Unfortunately I was not able to work on the game before the last day of the jam, so the result looks accordingly..

Known bugs: You can't shoot until you approach the first enemy!

Resources used:

  • top down shooter mechanics are loosely based on the tutorials by jmbiv
  • game assets are made by kenney
  • health icons are made by knik1985
  • dialogues are made with Dialogic
  • font used: DynaPuff
